name: htmltemplate-vdom
description: HTML::Template engine on top of virtual-dom
author: Artem Tyurin <artem.tyurin@gmail.com>

scripts.precompile: node ./bin/compile-template.js --path ../example/precompile/tmpl.inc > example/precompile/template.js; cat example/precompile/template.js | uglifyjs -c -m > example/precompile/template.min.js
